lhead :: [a1] -> [a2] -> [a2] #

lhead xs ys = take (length xs) ys, but the rhs is stricter

loop :: (t -> t) -> t #

lsplit :: [a1] -> [a2] -> ([a2], [a2]) #

lsplit xs ys = (lhead xs ys,ltail xs ys), but without the space leak, -fpbu

ltail :: [a1] -> [a2] -> [a2] #

ltail xs ys = drop (length xs) ys, but the rhs is stricter
